feed.title: 医药知识挖掘分析的设计思维
feed.subtitle: Design Thinking for Smart Medicine
feed.rights: All rights reserved 2020, 医药知识挖掘分析的设计思维

entry.title: 【资源】医药类免费图书：Springer出版，33种
entry.content:
新冠疫情期，知名出版商施普林格（Springer）宣布开放500多本专业教材和图书，涵盖多个不同学科领域，读者可免费下载pdf及Epub文件。

按其官网上提供的书目清单，英文版总共有408种。我从其中选出近10年出版的部分医药专业图书（大部分是研究生及本科高年级教材），加上部分不在清单里但也免费的，共33种，整理如下，方便大家学习参考：

  • Make Life Visible 2020
    https://doi.org/10.1007/978-981-13-7908-6

  • Good Research Practice in Non-Clinical Pharmacology and Biomedicine 2020
    https://doi.org/10.1007/978-3-030-33656-1

  • Bioimage Data Analysis Workflows 2020
    https://doi.org/10.1007/978-3-030-22386-1

  • Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19) : Epidemiology, Pathogenesis, Diagnosis, and Therapeutics 2020
    https://doi.org/10.1007/978-981-15-4814-7

  • MERS Coronavirus : Methods and Protocols 2020
    https://doi.org/10.1007/978-1-0716-0211-9

  • Data and Text Processing for Health and Life Sciences 2019
    https://doi.org/10.1007/978-3-030-13845-5

  • Understanding Statistics and Experimental Design 2019
    https://doi.org/10.1007/978-3-030-03499-3

  • Fundamentals of Clinical Data Science 2019
    http://doi.org/10.1007/978-3-319-99713-1

  • Pharmaceutical Biotechnology 5th ed. 2019
    (此书第5版虽在清单里但尚未免费，后面有第四版)
    http://doi.org/10.1007/978-3-030-00710-2

  • Pharmaceutical Biotechnology 4th ed. 2013
    http://doi.org/10.1007/978-1-4614-6486-0

  • Spine Surgery 1st ed. 2019
    http://doi.org/10.1007/978-3-319-98875-7

  • Applied Bioinformatics 2nd ed. 2018
    http://doi.org/10.1007/978-3-319-68301-0

  • Genome Editing in Neurosciences 2017
    https://doi.org/10.1007/978-3-319-60192-2

  • Evidence-Based Critical Care 1st ed. 2017
    http://doi.org/10.1007/978-3-319-43341-7

  • Phylogenomics 1st ed. 2017
    http://doi.org/10.1007/978-3-319-54064-1

  • Fundamentals of Biomechanics 4th ed. 2017
    http://doi.org/10.1007/978-3-319-44738-4

  • Cardiovascular Biomechanics 1st ed. 2017
    http://doi.org/10.1007/978-3-319-46407-7

  • Breast Cancer 1st ed. 2017
    http://doi.org/10.1007/978-3-319-48848-6

  • The ASCRS Textbook of Colon and Rectal Surgery 3rd ed. 2016
    http://doi.org/10.1007/978-3-319-25970-3

  • A Time for Metabolism and Hormones 2016
    https://doi.org/10.1007/978-3-319-27069-2

  • SPSS for Starters and 2nd Levelers 2nd ed. 2016
    http://doi.org/10.1007/978-3-319-20600-4

  • Evolutionary Thinking in Medicine 1st ed. 2016
    http://doi.org/10.1007/978-3-319-29716-3

  • Essentials of Cerebellum and Cerebellar Disorders 1st ed. 2016
    http://doi.org/10.1007/978-3-319-24551-5

  • Clinical Data Analysis on a Pocket Calculator 2nd ed. 2016
    http://doi.org/10.1007/978-3-319-27104-0

  • Innovative Medicine 2015
    https://doi.org/10.1007/978-4-431-55651-0

  • Machine Learning in Medicine - a Complete Overview 2015
    http://doi.org/10.1007/978-3-319-15195-3

  • Handbook of Cardiac Anatomy, Physiology, and Devices 3rd ed. 2015
    http://doi.org/10.1007/978-3-319-19464-6

  • Integrative Human Biochemistry 1st ed. 2015
    http://doi.org/10.1007/978-1-4939-3058-6

  • Biomedical Informatics 4th ed. 2014
    http://doi.org/10.1007/978-1-4471-4474-8

  • The Gastrointestinal System 2014
    http://doi.org/10.1007/978-94-017-8771-0

  • Metabolism of Human Diseases 2014
    http://doi.org/10.1007/978-3-7091-0715-7

  • Statistical Analysis of Clinical Data on a Pocket Calculator 2011
    http://doi.org/10.1007/978-94-007-1211-9

  • Epidemiological Research: Terms and Concepts 2011
    http://doi.org/10.1007/978-94-007-1171-6
